de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.api

Interface RepositoryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepositoryServiceDbData

    public interface RepositoryService
    This interface contains methods that are related to accessing/creating/deleting... documents, Users, and Projects for the annotation system. while meta data about documents and projects and users are stored in the database, source and annotation documents are stored in a file system
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam, Richard Eckart de Castilho

    • Method Detail

      • createAnnotationDocument

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void createAnnotationDocument(AnnotationDocument annotationDocument)
        creates the AnnotationDocument object in the database.
        Parameters:
        annotationDocument - AnnotationDocument comprises of the the name of the SourceDocument , id of SourceDocument, id of the Project, and id of User

      • createAnnotationDocumentContent

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void createAnnotationDocumentContent(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                                                SourceDocument document,
                                                User user)
                                     throws IOException
        Creates an annotation document which is CAS object seriealized in xmi format using the SerializedCasWriter. The AnnotationDocument is stored in the webanno.home/project/Project.id/document/document.id/annotation/username.ser. annotated documents are stored per project, user and document
        Parameters:
        user - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createCurationDocumentContent

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void createCurationDocumentContent(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                                              SourceDocument document,
                                              User user)
                                   throws IOException
        Create a curation annotation document under a special user named as "CURATION_USER"
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createProject

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_REMOTE\')")
void createProject(Project project,
                              User user)
                   throws IOException
        Creates a Project. Creating a project needs a global ROLE_ADMIN role. For the first time the project is created, an associated project path will be created on the file system as webanno.home/project/Project.id
        Parameters:
        aProject - The Project object to be created.
        user - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException - If the specified webanno.home directory is not available no write permission

      • createProjectPermission

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\', \'ROLE_REMOTE\')")
void createProjectPermission(ProjectPermission permission)
                             throws IOException
        creates a project permission, adding permission level for the user in the given project
        Parameters:
        permission -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createSourceDocument

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\',\'ROLE_REMOTE\')")
void createSourceDocument(SourceDocument document,
                                     User user)
                          throws IOException
        Creates a SourceDocument in a database. The source document is created by ROLE_ADMIN or Project admins. Source documents are created per project and it should have a unique name in the Project it belongs. renaming a a source document is not possible, rather the administrator should delete and re create it.
        Parameters:
        document - SourceDocument to be created
        user - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException

        A Method that checks if there is already an annotation document created for the source document
        Parameters:
        annotationDocument -
        Returns:

      • existsProject

        boolean existsProject(String name)
        A method that check is a project exists with the same name already. getSingleResult() fails if the project is not created, hence existProject returns false.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:

      • getProjectPermisions

        List<ProjectPermission> getProjectPermisions(Project project)

      • getSourceDocument

        SourceDocument getSourceDocument(String documentName,
                               Project project)
        Get meta data information about SourceDocument from the database. This method is called either for AnnotationDocument object creation or createSourceDocument(SourceDocument, User)
        Parameters:
        documentName - the name of the SourceDocument
        project - the Project where the SourceDocument belongs
        Returns:

      • getSourceDocumentContent

        File getSourceDocumentContent(Project project,
                            SourceDocument document)
        Return the Master TCF file Directory path. For the first time, all available TCF layers will be read and converted to CAS object. subsequent accesses will be to the annotated document unless and otherwise the document is removed from the project.
        Parameters:
        project - The Project wherever the Source document belongs
        document - The SourceDocument to be examined
        Returns:
        the Directory path of the source document

      • getUser

        User getUser(String username)
        Get a User object from the database based on the username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to be searched in the database
        Returns:
        a Single User object

        List<AnnotationDocument> listAnnotationDocument(SourceDocument document)
        List all AnnotationDocuments of this SourceDocument including those created by project admins or super admins for Test purpose. This method is called when a source document is deleted so that associated annotation documents also get removed.
        Parameters:
        document -
        Returns:

        List<Project> listProjects()

      • listSourceDocuments

      • removeProject

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\')")
void removeProject(Project project,
                              User aser)
                   throws IOException
        Remove a project. A ROLE_ADMIN or project admin can remove a project. removing a project will remove associated source documents and annotation documents.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to be deleted
        aUser - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException - if the project to be deleted is not available in the file system

      • removeSourceDocument

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\', \'ROLE_REMOTE\')")
void removeSourceDocument(SourceDocument document,
                                     User user)
                          throws IOException
        ROLE_ADMINs or Projetc admins can remove source documents from a project. removing a a source document also removes an annotation document related to that document
        Parameters:
        document - the source document to be deleted
        user - The User who perform this operation
        Throws:
        IOException - If the source document searched for deletion is not availble

      • removeAnnotationDocument

        void removeAnnotationDocument(AnnotationDocument annotationDocument)
        Remove an annotation document, for example, when a user is removed from a project
        Parameters:
        annotationDocument - the AnnotationDocument to be removed

      • saveUserSettings

        <T> void saveUserSettings(String username,
                        Project project,
                        Mode subject,
                        T configurationObject)
                      throws FileNotFoundException,
                             IOException
        Save annotation references, such as BratAnnotator#windowSize..., in a properties file so that they are not required to configure every time they open the document.
        Parameters:
        username - the user name
        subject - differentiate the setting, either it is for AnnotationPage or CurationPage
        configurationObject - The Object to be saved as preference in the properties file.
        project - The project where the user is working on.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException

      • savePropertiesFile

        void savePropertiesFile(Project project,
                      InputStream is,
                      String fileName)
                        throws IOException
        Save some properties file associated to a project, such as meta-data.properties
        Parameters:
        project - The project for which the user save some properties file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • uploadSourceDocument

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\',\'ROLE_REMOTE\')")
void uploadSourceDocument(File file,
                                     SourceDocument document,
                                     long projectId,
                                     User user)
                          throws IOException,
                                 org.apache.uima.UIMAException,
                                 eu.clarin.weblicht.wlfxb.io.WLFormatException
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException
        eu.clarin.weblicht.wlfxb.io.WLFormatException

      • uploadSourceDocument

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_USER\',\'ROLE_REMOTE\')")
void uploadSourceDocument(InputStream file,
                                     SourceDocument document,
                                     long projectId,
                                     User user)
                          throws IOException,
                                 org.apache.uima.UIMAException,
                                 eu.clarin.weblicht.wlfxb.io.WLFormatException
        Upload a SourceDocument, obtained as Inputstream, such as from remote API Zip folder to a repository directory. This way we don't need to create the file to a temporary folder
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException
        eu.clarin.weblicht.wlfxb.io.WLFormatException
